post:
Hello again LET :)

Some places celebrate May Day on the 1st of May. In the UK (where we're based), it's generally celebrated on the 1st Monday of May, which just so happens to be today! So go celebrate by keeping yourself safe and secure online with a VPN.

At [VPN.sh](http://www.vpn.sh) we pride ourselves on keeping you secure online. We have a total of 10 locations, and all accounts with us get access to all of the locations. Any new locations that we add will automatically be added to your account for you to access. We're currently lining up a few more North American locations, and some other locations that are in relatively high demand over the next few weeks, so keep your eyes peeled!

Here we have an exclusive offer for LowEndTalk users!

**Locations:**

**50GB bandwidth** across **10 locations**
1. Chicago 1
2. Chicago 2
3. Germany (Frankfurt)
4. Germany (Dusseldorf)
5. UK
6. Canada
7. Switzerland

**VPN Features:**

* Only your bandwidth usage is logged, so to keep users on the right packages

* We accept PayPal and Google Checkout

**Order details:
50GB Package: £2/month, £9/semi-annually, £16/annually** - **[Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=5)**

This is completely exclusive to LowEndTalk and will not be offered anywhere else.

Thanks!
